snippet: Religious intolerance seems to be part of the message sent to student-athletes on the sporting fields of Texas.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the Texas Assn of Private and Parochial Schools for its reluctance to accommodate an Orthodox Jewish school and reschedule a basketball game that would have violated the Sabbath; asserts that the association's treatment of Muslims is even more ignorant and bigoted.
